/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. 

On either side of the street, there are buildings painted in shades of red and brown. These structures add a touch of urban charm to the landscape. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting beautifully with the red and brown hues of the buildings. 

The perspective of the image is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. It's as if the viewer is standing right there on the street, looking up at the buildings and the sky. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
